                  • com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval.TestDescribe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class TestDescribe
extends AbstractDataDrivenSPARQLTestCase
    Data driven test suite for DESCRIBE queries, including the interaction with the optional DESCRIBE cache.
    Version:
    $Id: TestBasicQuery.java 6387 2012-07-21 18:37:51Z thompsonbry $
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    DESCRIBE CACHE TODO Test that resources that exist in the data (or solutions) but that were NOT included in the DESCRIBE projection are NOT injected into the DESCRIBE cache.

      • getExpectedDescription

        protected Set<org.openrdf.model.Statement> getExpectedDescription(BigdataValue resource,
                                                                  AbstractDataDrivenSPARQLTestCase.TestHelper h)
        Return the expected description of the resource based on the solutions declared for the unit test.

        Note: This code is not smart enough to get the expected description for CBD. It would have to fix point things, iterating through the expected statements if new blank nodes are discovered for the graph we are building.

        Parameters:
        resource - The resource.
        h -
        Returns:
        The expected description -or- null if there is no expected description for that resource.

         PREFIX rdf:  
 PREFIX rdfs: 
 PREFIX foaf: 
 
 DESCRIBE

      • test_describe_2

        public void test_describe_2()
                     throws Exception
        A simple DESCRIBE query of a variable with a where clause. 
         PREFIX rdf:  
 PREFIX rdfs: 
 PREFIX foaf: 
 
 DESCRIBE ?y  
 where {
   ?y rdf:type foaf:Person 
 }
        Throws:
        Exception

      • test_describe_3

        public void test_describe_3()
                     throws Exception
        A simple DESCRIBE query of a constant plus a variable with a where clause. 
         PREFIX rdf:  
 PREFIX rdfs: 
 PREFIX foaf: 
 
 DESCRIBE ?y   
 where {
   ?y rdf:type foaf:Person 
 }

      • test_describe_4

        public void test_describe_4()
                     throws Exception
        DESCRIBE a variable. 
         PREFIX : 
 PREFIX rdf:  
 PREFIX rdfs: 
 PREFIX foaf: 
 
 DESCRIBE ?x
 WHERE {
  ?x rdf:type :person .
  ?x :likes :rdf .
 }
        Throws:
        Exception

        public void test_describe_CBD_1()

         DESCRIBE 
 {
    hint:Query hint:describeMode "CBD"
 }
        This example is taken directly from CBD - Concise Bounded Description
